long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can be used to save notes by grouping them with folders.
You can change the theme, download the json file of saved notes which you can copy to some other device

New features:
Added search functionality
Tab arrows are added when tabs are overflowing

Fixes:
Fixed autoscrolling of tab when arrows are visible
Fixed theme colors with text color
